name: www.silverstripe.org
description: Framework and CMS.

name: www.silverstripe.com
description: Silverstripe Ltd., the company behind the CMS.

name: API Docs
description: Autogenerated API documentation.

name: Technical Documentation
description: For developers. Explains all core concepts.

name: Using the CMS
description: Documentation for end users how to use the core features.

name: Silverstripe Lessons
description: Learn how to build a Silverstripe site step by step with a real-world project.

name: Font reference
description: Built in icon font for backend usage.

name: TinyMCE Configuration Examples For SS3
description: Configuration examples for the HTMLEditorField.

name: Official Silverstripe Blog
description: News around Silverstripe CMS.

name: SilverStrip.es
description: Useful findings of Silverstripe developers.

name: Official StripeCon YouTube Channel
description: Talks of various StripeCon conferences.

name: Official Silverstripe Vimeo Channel
description: Various videos from meetups and conferences.

name: Stack Overflow
description: Silverstripe related questions on Stack Overflow.

name: Silverstripe User Slack
description: Community slack channel for instant help or hanging around with other developers.

name: Forum
description: Official forum for asking questions or discussing.

name: European Silverstripe Conference
description: Every year in another country.

name: Meetups
description: A list of Silverstripe related Meetups.

name: SS Addons: Themes and Modules
description: The official module registry.

name: SSMods: Detailed Module Search
description: Alternative module search.

name: Most Used Modules
description: Shows which modules are downloaded most.

name: Silverstripe Recipes on Packagist
description: Preconfigured sets of modules for different kind of projects.

name: Multiuser editing alert
description: Alerts users in the Silverstripe CMS when multiple people are editing the same page.

name: Fluent
description: Multi-language translate module for Silverstripe, without having to manage separate site trees.

name: Autotranslate
description: Creates automatic translations of fields using Google Translate API.

name: Silverstripe Searchable
description: Adds more complex site searching using the Silverstripe ORM. With dedicated templates for search results across multiple search objects.

name: Searchable DataObjects
description: Fast and simple MySQL based search. Useful for single language sites.

name: Fulltext Search
description: Full fledged search interface for Solr4.

name: Fulltext Search Local Solr
description: Easy to install Solr4 instance for local development.

name: Solr search
description: Interface for Solr search, supporting up to the latest Solr version. With submodules for e.g. transitioning from the "Fulltext Search" module, as well as subsite, fluent and others.

name: Debugbar
description: Shows debugging statistics in your browser.

name: IdeAnnotator
description: Auto-generates class annotations on dev/build.

name: Populate
description: Populate your database through YAML files.

name: Mock DataObjects
description: Allows DataObjects to self-populate intelligently with fake data.

name: Version Truncator
description: Automatically delete old SiteTree page versions.

name: UserSwitcher
description: Adds a small form both in the frontend and backend to quickly login as any user.

name: Masquerade
description: Allows an Administrator to "login" as another "Member". This can be useful for debugging and remote support.

name: Markdown Field
description: Can replace your HTMLEditorFields (using TinyMCE) so you can utilise Markdown syntax.

name: Code Editor Field
description: Gives you a syntax-highlighted text area field - great for CMS-based YAML or HTML.

name: SSPak
description: Tool for managing bundles of db/assets from Silverstripe environments.

name: SSPy
description: Python version of SSPak, that can handle assets more than 2GB.

name: VSCode Silverstripe
description: Syntax highlighting for Silverstripe template files in VSCode.

name: Jetbrains / PHPStorm Silverstripe Template Language Support
description: Syntax highlighting for Silverstripe template files.

name: PHPStorm / Webstorm Live Templates
description: Shortcuts for adding various Silverstripe specific code snippets.

name: Twisted Bytes
description: Useful vagrant box with multiple PHP versions, MariaDB or PostgreSQL, mail catcher and much more.

name: Twisted Bytes Box Templates
description: Useful templates for different development scenarios using the Twisted Bytes vagrant box.

name: Laravel Homestead
description: Prepackaged box for local development.

name: Scotchbox
description: Popular LAMP/LEMP stack for local development.

name: Zauberfisch Vagrant Boxes
description: Preconfigured Vagrant boxes for SS3 and SS4.

name: brettt89/silverstripe-web
description: Apache + PHP Docker image with pre-installed PHP modules for SilverStripe support.

name: brettt89/sspak
description: SSPak Docker image.

name: brettt89/silverstripe-solr-cwp
description: CWP Solr Docker image.
